sqlQuery.name: GroupAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select og.NEW_GROUP_ID as group_name, og.OLD_GROUP_ID as old_group_name from apidb.groupmapping og

sqlQuery.name: ByNameList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE lower(og.group_id) IN (SELECT DISTINCT(lower(gm.new_group_id)) as group_id FROM apidb.GroupMapping gm, ($$group_names$$) ds WHERE lower(gm.old_group_id) IN lower(ds.group_name) )

sqlQuery.name: ByPfamIdOrKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT domain.group_name FROM (SELECT group_name, COUNT(distinct full_id) as num_proteins FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment WHERE group_name IS NOT NULL AND (accession LIKE UPPER(REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) -- OR symbol LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%') OR description LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) GROUP BY group_name ) domain, apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.group_id = domain.group_name AND domain.num_proteins >= $$min_num_proteins$$ AND (domain.num_proteins / og.number_of_members) >= $$min_fraction_proteins$$

sqlQuery.name: ByKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, dots.AaSequenceImp asi WHERE sa.aa_sequence_id = asi.aa_sequence_id AND asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND CATSEARCH(asi.description, $$keyword$$, '')>0

sqlQuery.name: BySequenceCount
sqlQuery.sql: select og.group_id as group_name, og.number_of_core_members as core_num, og.number_of_peripheral_members as peripheral_num from apidb.orthologgroup og WHERE og.number_of_core_members >= $$core_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_core_members <= $$core_count_max$$ AND og.number_of_peripheral_members >= $$peripheral_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_peripheral_members <= $$peripheral_count_max$$ AND og.number_of_members >= $$all_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_members <=$$all_count_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByGenomeCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT group_name, core_count, peripheral_count, core_count+peripheral_count AS all_count FROM ( SELECT DECODE(c.group_name,NULL,p.group_name,c.group_name) as group_name, DECODE(c.core_count,NULL,0,c.core_count) as core_count, DECODE(p.peripheral_count,NULL,0,p.peripheral_count) as peripheral_count FROM (SELECT group_name, COUNT(distinct taxon_abbreviation) AS core_count FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE core_peripheral='C' GROUP BY group_name) c FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_name, COUNT(distinct taxon_abbreviation) AS peripheral_count FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE core_peripheral='P' GROUP BY group_name) p ON c.group_name = p.group_name ) WHERE core_count>=$$core_taxon_min$$ AND core_count<=$$core_taxon_max$$ AND peripheral_count>=$$peripheral_taxon_min$$ AND peripheral_count<=$$peripheral_taxon_max$$ AND (core_count+peripheral_count)>=$$all_taxon_min$$ AND (core_count+peripheral_count)<=$$all_taxon_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByEValue
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroupStats ogs WHERE ogs.stat_Type = 'median' AND ogs.evalue >= CONCAT('1.0000E', REPLACE('$$evalue_min$$', '.0', '')) AND ogs.evalue <= CONCAT('1.0000E', REPLACE('$$evalue_max$$', '.0', '')) AND protein_subset IN ('C+P','R')

sqlQuery.name: ByPhyleticPattern
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, ($$phyletic_expression$$) ex WHERE og.group_id = ex.group_id

sqlQuery.name: ByEcNumber
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sec.group_name from ApidbTuning.sequenceenzymeclass sec where ( sec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_number_type_ahead$$),' ',''),'-', '%') OR sec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_wildcard$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%') OR sec.description LIKE REPLACE($$ec_wildcard$$, '*', '%') )

sqlQuery.name: FromSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.group_name, sum(answer.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, ($$sequence_answer$$) answer WHERE sa.full_id = answer.full_id GROUP BY sa.group_name

sqlQuery.name: AllGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.group_id AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og
